item.title: 【Multi-Channel Notification Patterns for Security-Critical Events】关键事件的多通道通知模式
item.description:
【

As the degree of account takeovers and unauthorized access attempts continues to be more and more sophisticated, the time to notify users about security-critical situations has become a vital issue. The moment when a system becomes aware of irregular behavior — such as a log from a new device or suspicious activity — it is necessary that the corporation ensures users are immediately notified and receive the notice through a reliable channel.

One source of a channel (such as email only) is not enough. When they are sent, shortcomings in the technology of delivery arise. Multi-channel approaches, in contrast, increase the likelihood of the messages' delivery and further action by the users who improve their accounts by this and reduce the possible compromise risk.

】

随着帐户收购程度和未经授权的访问尝试越来越复杂，通知用户关键安全情况的时间已成为一个至关重要的问题。当系统意识到不规则行为（例如新设备的日志或可疑活动的日志）时，公司有必要确保立即通知用户并通过可靠的渠道接收通知。

频道的一个来源（例如电子邮件）是不够的。当它们发送时，交付技术的缺点就会出现。相比之下，多渠道方法增加了通过此信息提高帐户并降低可能折衷风险的用户的交付和进一步行动的可能性。

item.title: 【Beyond the Checklist: A Security Architect's Guide to Comprehensive Assessments】超越清单：安全建筑师的全面评估指南
item.description:

This guide provides a framework for security architects to conduct holistic and impactful security assessments, delving into critical control areas that define a robust security posture.

item.title: 【Serverless vs Containers: Choosing the Right Architecture for Your Application】无服务器与容器：选择适合您应用程序的架构
item.description:
【

Choosing the right architecture for your application is crucial to make it low-cost, performant, and scalable. Two of the leading software development methods today, serverless and container-based architectures, have distinct patterns for application release and application processing. In this article, we discuss their technical intricacies, key distinctions, and under which conditions to make use of each, with code examples to illustrate specific application uses.

What Is Serverless Architecture?

Serverless computing eliminates infrastructure administration, leaving developers to write code alone. Provisioning, scaling, and servicing are controlled by cloud platforms such as AWS Lambda, Azure Functions, and Google Cloud Functions.

】

为您的应用程序选择正确的体系结构对于使其低成本，性能和可扩展性至关重要。如今，两种领先的软件开发方法，无服务器和基于容器的架构，具有不同的模式用于应用程序发布和应用程序处理。在本文中，我们讨论了它们的技术复杂性，关键区别，以及在哪些条件下使用每个条件，并用代码示例说明特定的应用程序用途。

什么是无服务器体系结构？

无服务器计算消除基础架构管理，使开发人员仅编写代码。供应，缩放和维修由AWS Lambda，Azure功能和Google Cloud Functions等云平台控制。

item.title: 【Essential Steps to Building a Robust Cybersecurity Team】建立强大的网络安全团队的重要步骤
item.description:
【

Cybersecurity doesn’t fail because someone forgot to patch a server. It fails because no one asked the right questions early enough, and because the wrong people were trusted to find the answers.

Most companies start building a cybersecurity team only after something breaks. A breach hits. Logs go missing. Customer data leaks. Then suddenly, there’s a mad rush to find “cyber talent” — as if throwing more engineers at the fire will fix a decade of neglected fundamentals.

】

网络安全不会失败，因为有人忘记了修补服务器。它失败了，因为没有人能尽早提出正确的问题，并且因为错误的人被信任找到答案。

大多数公司只有在某些事情破裂之后才开始建立一个网络安全团队。违反命中。日志丢失了。客户数据泄漏。然后突然，发现“网络人才”很疯狂 - 仿佛在大火上投掷更多的工程师会解决十年的被忽视的基本面。
